source.name: Unearthed Arcana: Subclasses Revisited
source.author: Wizards of the Coast
source.description: Three subclasses reappear today in Unearthed Arcana, each with a new form. After studying your feedback on the Revived, Noble Genie, and Archivist subclasses, we've crafted new versions for your consideration: the Phantom, the Genie, and the Order of Scribes.
